pages.text: Just like buddysteel armor, buddysteel gear will become more powerful as you collect more cards. If you have no sets completed, it's as good as iron, but by the time you complete all of them, it will become stronger than even netherite.

pages.title: Enchantments
pages.text: Because of the cards that helped form the buddysteel, the tools can be enchanted with Buddy Binding, as well as all other enchantments you could enchant other variants of the tool with.
